Articles.Content:
No, that was my evil twin that you killed.

I put the next poster in the middle of a zombie apcolipse.

Republic Commandos in Hawker Hunters.

they attack the next poster after dealing wit the zombies.

Scotty, beam me up!

I crash the USS Enterprize into the next poster.
I duck, and it hits the next poster.

But I am in the Enterprize... Heck, logic is for noobs. I shoot the Enterprize (that I am also in) with a nuclear RPG, destroying it and killing my evil twin that was inside of it.

I also shoot my nuclear RPG at the next poster.

You miss, and the radiation also does no damage since I am already a radioactive monster.

I than bring out my Bacon Commando skills and attack the next poster Rambo style.

I grab Steven hawking's wheelchair and deflect that Rambo attack, Hawking style

I throw Steven hawking at the next poster...

Stephen Hawking gets sucked into a nearby Black Hole

I then punch the next poster in the noggin
Well, that doesn't kill me, so the shockwave transfers to the next poster.
Mandolorian Beskar'Gam (armour) cant get into that. I then Verp the next poster.

I had my Mk3 Katarn Armor on. (I see you have read the SWRC novels...)

There is a DC-17 Anti-Armor round headed towards the next poster.

No.

I send Tex (From Halo Red vs Blue) to kill the next poster.

I use Sheila to kill Tex.

Rod from The Gods on next poster.

Rods from gods proof vest.

I throw a week old loaf of freanch bread at the next poster.
still got my armour

You didn't attack me.

I put a land mine under the next poster's bed.

you didn't. that was fixer's bed (and it had high explosives under it anyway)

next poster hit by a car

The car was only going 2 m/s.

I throw the next poster into a black hole.

The black hole turns out to be a strange dimension where time is a dimensional object.

The next poster is mauled by 30 goats.

I teleport.

I fire ze missiles at the next poster.

I fire ze countermeasures.

I bomb the next poster.

I duck

I attack the next poster with a flamethrower.

I am a dual Water-Rock type, so it's only 1/4 as effective as normal.

I throw a man-eating lobster at the next poster.

I throw a lobster-eating man at the man-eating lobster.

The next poster get's bit by a walker (AKA zombie).

I hit him back.

next poster is blown up.
